snippet: Mr. Bonomo has been accused of providing a no-show job to the son of Dean G. Skelos, the former New York State Senate majority leader.
abstract: New York Racing Assn chairman Anthony Bonomo requests leave of absence days before Belmont Stakes; says he does not want his indictment on corruption charges to distract from association's work.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bonomo has been accused of providing a no-show job to the son of Dean G. Skelos, the former New York State Senate majority leader.

headline.main: NYRA Chairman, Anthony Bonomo, Is Taking a Leave of Absence
headline.print_headline: NYRA Chairman Is Taking a Leave of Absence
